rooms.name: MERCHANT LOBBY +
rooms.desc: You are at the entrance to the store. There is a passage leading downward to the market area.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: SAND DOLLAR ROOM
rooms.desc: The hot sand burns your feet.

rooms.name: LONELY PATHWAY
rooms.desc: The passage here is a narrow one. It stretches from east to west.

rooms.name: FIERY ROOM
rooms.desc: There are dead cacti all around. The walls are covered with soot from a crevice, exposing hot lava.

rooms.name: NORTH PATH
rooms.desc: Clouds gather overhead, warning of impending danger!

rooms.name: CAVERN HEAD +
rooms.desc: You have reached the entrance to a large cavern.

rooms.name: BURIAL GROUNDS +
rooms.desc: Here lie the remains of the inhabitants of the cavern. It appears to be a sacred burial ground.

rooms.name: CAVERN AMPHITHEATRE +
rooms.desc: You are standing in a large room. Every sound echoes off the wall. A strange message is spray-painted on the wall: 'SSSWWN'

rooms.name: CAVERN PASSAGE
rooms.desc: The walls contain mysterious markings from an ancient civilization.

rooms.name: CAVERN HOLE
rooms.desc: You can see a glimmer of light to the west as you approach an exit.

rooms.name: CAVERN ENTRANCE
rooms.desc: You have reached the entrance to a large cavern. You see large bats flying in and out of the cave... Dare you enter this dark, forbidden place?

rooms.name: VOLCANO ROOM
rooms.desc: You are able to maneuver around the hot molten lava from recent volcanic activity in the area.

rooms.name: SULPHUR ROOM
rooms.desc: You gasp for air as sulphur fumes overwhelm you.

rooms.name: GLASS ROOM
rooms.desc: You are in a room with glass walls.

rooms.name: JUNCTION +
rooms.desc: You have reached a major intersection. The path continues in many directions to different areas within the dungeon. A faded sign seems to read: 'Fo- a go-d t-me g- SSSSSENNEN'

rooms.name: GLOOMY PATH +
rooms.desc: You are on a lonely, narrow, dark path. Treasures, perils, and mysteries await the adventuresome...

rooms.name: CAVERN WELL
rooms.desc: ...bar...bar...

rooms.name: EDGE OF FOREST
rooms.desc: You have reached the edge of a large underground forest.

rooms.name: ASH ROOM
rooms.desc: The floor of this room is covered by several feet of volcanic ash.

rooms.name: COAL MINE
rooms.desc: This appears to be the entrance to a large coal mine. Abandoned many years ago, the mine was once the source of fuel for those of the Enchanted Land.

rooms.name: IGNEOUS ROOM
rooms.desc: Igneous rocks abound.

rooms.name: WALL BAR & GRILL
rooms.desc: You stand in the doorway of a smoke-filled bar. A sign on the wall reads: "Wall Bar & Grill."

rooms.name: CAVERN LEDGE -]----
rooms.desc: You see a deep chasm below.

rooms.name: CAVERN PEAK -]---- HQ
rooms.desc: You have reached the highest point of the cavern. A deep underground forest can be seen below. There is a large Mark of the Sword carved in the rock.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within an underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within an underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within an underground forest.

rooms.name: MINE SHAFT
rooms.desc: You can see the bright sun beaming in from above through the narrow shaft.

rooms.name: STORAGE ROOM //> HQ
rooms.desc: All supplies for operations were stored here. A large Mark of the Claw is on the wall.

rooms.name: RUBY ROOM //>
rooms.desc: The walls of this room are adorned with precious gems.

rooms.name: MINERAL ROOM
rooms.desc: Rich mineral deposits form this room. A strange door is north.

rooms.name: STALACTITE ROOM
rooms.desc: Large stalactites are hanging from the ceiling.

rooms.name: STALAGMITE ROOM
rooms.desc: Large stalagmites extend upward from the cavern floor.

rooms.name: EDGE OF FOREST -]----
rooms.desc: You are at the edge of a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: TUNNEL
rooms.desc: The mine tunnel runs north and south.

rooms.name: CONTROL ROOM //>
rooms.desc: A large control panel is mounted in the wall. All operations of the mine were controlled from this room.

rooms.name: BREEZY TUNNEL
rooms.desc: A cool, brisk wind blows through the room... chilling you to the bone!

rooms.name: BAT ROOM
rooms.desc: You have reached the opening to a large cavern. Vampire bats fly overhead!

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: EDGE OF FOREST
rooms.desc: You have reached the entrance to a large underground forest.

rooms.name: LOADING DOCK
rooms.desc: This is where the coal was brought out from the mine and shipped to the people of the Enchanted Land.

rooms.name: SMOKY ROOM
rooms.desc: You look down into a large hole in the middle of the room. Certainly there is a way down into that pit...

rooms.name: TOP LEDGE
rooms.desc: You are at the top of a deep mine shaft.

rooms.name: MINE OPENING
rooms.desc: Through a small opening you are able to gain entrance to this old abandoned coal mine.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: UNDERGROUND FOREST
rooms.desc: You are deep within a large underground forest.

rooms.name: MINE ENTRANCE
rooms.desc: You have reached the main entrance to a coal mine.

rooms.name: MINE EXIT
rooms.desc: You are at the exit of a large coal mine.

rooms.name: INNER MINE
rooms.desc: The mine tunnel continues east to west.

rooms.name: DEEP SHAFT
rooms.desc: A deep shaft is in the center of the room.

rooms.name: PIT
rooms.desc: The bones of mine workers, apparently buried in a cave-in, can be seen in the corner of the room.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: DARK ROOM
rooms.desc: This is a dimly-lit room. It is hard to get a sense of direction... you do detect an impending danger!

rooms.name: ANTECHAMBER ROOM
rooms.desc: This room was once used for the deceased. The smell of the dead remains.

rooms.name: COOL ROOM
rooms.desc: You are chilled to the bone, hearing sounds coming from another room close by!  A sign is stuck into the earth. It is written in strange handwriting, but you think you can make out the words: "dO yOu wAnNa TrAvEl tO fAr aWay pLaCes? tHen gO eAsT!"

rooms.name: TELEPORT ROOM|->
rooms.desc: You hear a noise as if a distant wind is rapidly approaching. You ponder the wisdom of leaving this room pronto...  But you also notice a strangely drawn symbol on the eastern wall, even though it looks like there is no exit that way...

rooms.name: GATE ROOM
rooms.desc: You have reached the entrance to the Enchanted Land.

rooms.name: HALLWAY
rooms.desc: A voice whispers, "Welcome, $. Venture forth into my Land with care!"

rooms.name: PATHWAY
rooms.desc: You are on a narrow path that enters the Enchanted Land.

rooms.name: CABANA
rooms.desc: You are in the cabana just outside the Enchanted Land.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: WELL ROOM
rooms.desc: There is a deep well here which once supplied the people of the Enchanted Land with fresh water.

rooms.name: SUPPLY ROOM
rooms.desc: This room was used to store food.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: DAMP ROOM
rooms.desc: This is an eerie, damp place.

rooms.name: LIBRARY
rooms.desc: There are many books in this room. The people were apparently a learned group.

rooms.name: GRAND BALLROOM
rooms.desc: You are standing in a large room that once was used for large gala affairs.

rooms.name: EAST HALL
rooms.desc: This is an L-shaped room with a fireplace in the corner.

rooms.name: HALLWAY ENTRANCE
rooms.desc: This is the entrance to the main ballrooms.

rooms.name: STORAGE HOUSE
rooms.desc: This room was once used to store supplies.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: FURNACE ROOM
rooms.desc: There is a large furnace in the room. It was used to heat the dungeons.

rooms.name: BOILER ROOM
rooms.desc: There is an old boiler in the corner.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: PEARL ROOM
rooms.desc: You are confused... how did you get here?

rooms.name: STUDY
rooms.desc: You are in a large study.

rooms.name: PIPE ROOM
rooms.desc: There is a large pipe organ here.

rooms.name: MUSIC ANTECHAMBER
rooms.desc: Small concertos were once held in this room.

rooms.name: SOUTH HALLWAY
rooms.desc: Rooms are off in various directions.

rooms.name: GAS ROOM ==[]
rooms.desc: This room was once the source of natural gas for the inhabitants.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: BASEMENT
rooms.desc: You have reached the basement.

rooms.name: STONE ROOM
rooms.desc: For some reason, all items in this room are made of stone!

rooms.name: OVAL ROOM
rooms.desc: You are in a large, oval-shaped room.

rooms.name: GAME ROOM
rooms.desc: You are in the game room.

rooms.name: LONG PASSAGE
rooms.desc: You are in a long passageway.

rooms.name: ANGLED ROOM
rooms.desc: You are in a strangely-shaped room.

rooms.name: TEAROOM ==[]
rooms.desc: A small table sits in the middle of this room, which was once used for social gatherings.

rooms.name: SECLUDED ROOM ==[] HQ
rooms.desc: You are in a large room... there is a strange symbol on the wall!

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: LABYRINTH
rooms.desc: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: TRANSPORT ROOM
rooms.desc: There is a sign on the wall. You can make out only a few of the words: "...The land of no return..."

rooms.name: MORNING ROOM
rooms.desc: There is a large hole in the roof and the sun comes gleaming through.

rooms.name: LONG PASSAGE
rooms.desc: You are in a long passageway.

rooms.name: SIGN ROOM
rooms.desc: A bizarre neon sign is propped up on the ground. It reads:  "START TODAY! DON'T DELAY! TRAVEL FAR, BEYOND THE STARS WIN THE GAME, ENJOY THE FAME!"

rooms.name: GARDEN ROOM
rooms.desc: Here are the remains of a once- beautiful garden.
